I can't find the specific location that I wished to address, but maybe the word will get to the owners of the CookOut on S. Tryon St. I visited there today with a complimentary coupon in hand following another visit in which the burger was so poorly wrapped in a bun that was too small that it ruined the white blouse I was wearing. It was also cooked to death! I ordered onion rings along with another burger today only to get home to find 4 small rings in the box. It was a paltry meal that hardly inspired my business after an already bad experience..
I"m done wth Cookout ---at that location in particular. There is no need to respond to me. I simply feel better knowing that someone knows I'm done! By S. Hankinson on April 20, 2011 at 01:01 PM Cookout Restaurant 5 Cookout Albermarble Rd

Went to a New Cook Out on Sardis rd in Charlotte NC Was charged $8.26, which is not the point, for 2 reg burgers and 2 fries. The burgers were very small with 1 small slither of lettuce and I was given 2 huge servings of fries. I could have gone next door to burger king and gotten 2dblcheese burgers and 2 fries for $4.00. The burger from cooko0ut was gone long before the fries and was very small and dry. I am very disappointed! I expected more, i feel cheated and will tell everyone about my bad experience.
